_description: ContentForge Trusted Data Sources Registry â€” Master list of authoritative sources per industry/brand
_instructions: Maintain this registry in Google Sheets for easier updates. ContentForge will reference this when conducting research and fact-checking.

company_official.description: Official company announcements, filings, press releases

encyclopedia.description: Reference works (use sparingly, not as primary source)

global_trusted_sources.name: PubMed / MEDLINE
global_trusted_sources.notes: Primary source for medical/pharmaceutical content. Peer-reviewed only.

global_trusted_sources.name: Google Scholar
global_trusted_sources.notes: Broad academic search. Verify source quality individually.

global_trusted_sources.name: CDC (Centers for Disease Control)
global_trusted_sources.notes: U.S. health data, disease statistics, public health guidance.

global_trusted_sources.name: WHO (World Health Organization)
global_trusted_sources.notes: Global health data and guidelines.

global_trusted_sources.name: FDA (Food and Drug Administration)
global_trusted_sources.notes: Drug approvals, safety alerts, regulatory guidance.

global_trusted_sources.name: SEC (Securities and Exchange Commission)
global_trusted_sources.notes: Company filings (10-K, 10-Q, 8-K), financial disclosures.

global_trusted_sources.name: Bureau of Labor Statistics
global_trusted_sources.notes: Employment data, wage statistics, economic indicators.

global_trusted_sources.name: Pew Research Center
global_trusted_sources.notes: Public opinion, demographic trends, social science research.

global_trusted_sources.name: Gartner Research
global_trusted_sources.notes: Technology market analysis, Magic Quadrants. Often paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: Forrester Research
global_trusted_sources.notes: Technology and business research. Often paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: McKinsey & Company Insights
global_trusted_sources.notes: Management consulting insights, industry reports.

global_trusted_sources.name: Harvard Business Review
global_trusted_sources.notes: Management and business strategy. Partially paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: Statista
global_trusted_sources.notes: Statistics aggregator. Verify original sources. Often paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: Wall Street Journal
global_trusted_sources.notes: Financial and business news. Paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: Reuters
global_trusted_sources.notes: International news, business, finance.

global_trusted_sources.name: Bloomberg
global_trusted_sources.notes: Financial news and data. Partially paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: The New York Times
global_trusted_sources.notes: General news. Paywalled. Verify for political neutrality.

global_trusted_sources.name: Nature
global_trusted_sources.notes: Premier scientific journal. Paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: Science (AAAS)
global_trusted_sources.notes: Top-tier scientific publication. Paywalled.

global_trusted_sources.name: The Lancet
global_trusted_sources.notes: Leading medical journal. Paywalled.

pharma.name: ClinicalTrials.gov
pharma.notes: Registry of clinical trials. Publicly accessible.

pharma.name: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America (PhRMA)
pharma.notes: Pharma industry association. Consider industry bias.

bfsi.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED)
bfsi.notes: Economic data from the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.

real_estate.name: National Association of Realtors (NAR)
real_estate.notes: Real estate market data and trends.

real_estate.name: Zillow Research
real_estate.notes: Housing market data. Company-produced, verify independently.

technology.name: IEEE Xplore
technology.notes: Electrical engineering and computer science research. Paywalled.

prohibited_sources.name: Wikipedia
prohibited_sources.reason: Not a primary source. Use only for initial research, never cite directly.
prohibited_sources.alternative: Follow Wikipedia's citations to original sources

prohibited_sources.name: Personal blogs (unknown authors)
prohibited_sources.reason: Unverified expertise. Use only if author credentials are established.

prohibited_sources.name: Content farms (e.g., eHow, About.com clones)
prohibited_sources.reason: Low editorial standards, often outdated or inaccurate.

prohibited_sources.name: Social media posts
prohibited_sources.reason: Unverified. Use only if from official company/expert accounts and clearly marked.

prohibited_sources.name: Press release aggregators
prohibited_sources.reason: Not independent sources. Go to original company press release if needed.
